ComicInfo.Summary:
From acclaimed 'Hulk' writer Greg Pak, legendary 'Walking Dead' producer Gale Anne Hurd, and Tony Parker, artist of the Eisner-nominated 'Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep', comes the biggest blockbuster series of the new year - DEAD MAN'S RUN! The price of a true innocent in the land of the condemned becomes terrifying clear as the Captain mercilessly absconds with Juniper, and Sam Tinker and crew must survive their way through the horrors he releases upon them in order to save her from the City of Corruption. Yet, the true nature of evil manifests itself when Sam reveals the last bits of the map needed to break out, only to discover a more sinister surprise than he ever could have possibly imagined-even in Hell!
